general.gigTitle: design or redesign modern squarespace website, website development

sellerCard.description: I am Akib, a certified full-time squarespace designer, and developer. I specialize in Squarespace website design and have over 5+ years of experience creating visually appealing, user-friendly websites with full e-commerce functionalities. I aim to provide my clients with a high-quality online presence that will leave them 100% satisfied. Ready to discuss your project and bring your online presence to life? Don't hesitate to get in touch with me today!

description.content:
Are you ready to elevate your online presence with a stunning, fully functional Squarespace website? Whether you are an entrepreneur, a business owner, or simply looking to make an impact, I am here to bring your vision to life.


With over 5 years of extensive experience in designing and developing mobile-friendly professional Squarespace websites that not only look great but also perform seamlessly. I can build professional or creative e-commerce, blogging, photography, and other websites.


What You Will Get:


- Create your Squarespace website from scratch

- Redesign your existing Squarespace website to elevate its appeal

- Resolve any issues on your Squarespace site

- Design a compelling Squarespace landing page

- Build a multilingual Squarespace site

- Set up a Squarespace membership site

- Design an e-commerce store on Squarespace

- Add new features to your site

- Transfer your current site to Squarespace


Why Did You Pick Me?


- High-Quality Work  

- On-Time Delivery  

- 24/7 Support


I pride myself on delivering exceptional customer experience and design that surpasses your expectations. Let's discuss your project!

slide.name: design or redesign modern squarespace website, website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do we need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, we need: 1. Login details. 2. Logo design and images for the site. 3. Page names and color schemes. 4. Reference site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you accept custom orders?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Just message me for a custom order. You can order me for any amount of pages on custom order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer Ongoing Sales Support?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide ongoing support for 30 days after project completion.

reviews.comment: He was extremely supportive and knowledgeable throughout the whole website creation process. He showcased his expertise during the entire process and exceeded expectations to guarantee all website details and functionalities met industry standards. I highly suggest His website services to anyone in need of a website.

seller_response.comment: Thanks for your kind words. I always deliver more to my clients.

reviews.comment:
I had the pleasure of working with Akib on designing my website, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the experience. From start to finish, he was incredibly helpful, always willing to take on any task I requested with efficiency and professionalism. His communication was excellent, ensuring that every step of the process was clear and seamless.

Not only did he create a stunning and fully functional website for me, but he also provided thorough instructions on how to manage and update it. His professional support and attention to detail made the entire process smooth and stress-free. If you're looking for a reliable and skilled website designer, I highly recommend Akib!

seller_response.comment: Excellent! Thank you very much for the great words and the tip. I hope to work with you again in the future.

reviews.comment: I’m thoroughly impressed with the work! The freelancer delivered high-quality work that perfectly matched my expectations. The process was smooth, and communication was excellent throughout. Highly recommend!

seller_response.comment: I look forward to future opportunities to work together!

reviews.comment: Outstanding work! He was quick to respond, understood my requirements, and provided a high-quality website. I will definitely work with him again.

seller_response.comment: I sincerely appreciate your kind words; it means a lot to me. Thank you.

reviews.comment: Amazing experience! He was responsive and made sure to deliver top-notch work. He were patient with revisions and made sure the final result was exactly what I want. Highly recommend!

seller_response.comment: Thank you very much for your words. Looking forward to working with you again.
